name: Bitbox IT Latam Group
description:
Ensuring customers a broad offering of technological products and services backed by a strong corporate vision. Our sustained growth is the result of the growth of our member companies: we promote networking among companies and among customers, which results in mutually strengthening synergy.
Integrity, continuous betterment, excellence, collaboration, and a positive attitude are the guiding values of our professional practice, and the underlying drivers of our work culture.
